HediffDef.label: system hacked
HediffDef.description: Psychically-induced targeting corrupt. send mechanoid into berserk

HediffDef.label: system burnt
HediffDef.description: Psychically-induced mind control, giving absolute control to another person.

HediffDef.label: Learning Boost
HediffDef.description: Psychically-induced brain efficiency boost.

HediffDef.label: Brain disrupt
HediffDef.description: the thinking part of the brain has been disrupted. cause them to lose efficiency.

HediffDef.label: Brain Dead
HediffDef.description: This pawn has their knowledge completely drained. leaving their brain as nothing but a empty husk.

HediffDef.label: Bonding Link
HediffDef.description: Psychically-induced link between several entities. Any 'Bonding' psycast will resonate between all linked individuals.

HediffDef.label: psychic bond
HediffDef.description: Psychically-induced bonding sense. This increases an individual's opinion of someone else

HediffDef.label: cleansed bond
HediffDef.description: Psychically-induced bonding sense. This increases an individual's opinion of someone else

HediffDef.label: Social Mind
HediffDef.description: Psychically-induced bonding sense. This increases an individual's opinion of someone else

HediffDef.label: Great Bargaining Boost
HediffDef.description: for a brief moment. this pawn bargaining ability is significantly boosted

HediffDef.label: Bargaining Boost
HediffDef.description: for a brief moment. this pawn bargaining ability is boosted

HediffDef.label: Amnesia(bargain)
HediffDef.description: for a brief moment. this pawn bargaining ability is significantly reduced

HediffDef.label: Friend Boost
HediffDef.description: psychically-induced hallucination that make this pawn see a illusion of a friend they feel at ease to talk to.

HediffDef.label: feel happy
HediffDef.description: psychically-induced joy, will make this person always feel happy for a while.

HediffDef.label: feel happy
HediffDef.description: psychically-induced joy, make this person have a better mood.

HediffDef.label: Tainted
HediffDef.description: Taint level to be used by other Corrupted Prophet ability

HediffDef.label: Mind taint
HediffDef.description: psychically-induced hallucination that make this pawn see a caster as friend. but the victim will die once the duration run out

HediffDef.label: Reverse Fate
HediffDef.description: the fate of this pawn has been reversed.

HediffDef.label: Mirrored Fate
HediffDef.description: pawn is reflecting back whatever damage they take to the attacker.

HediffDef.label: Life line
HediffDef.description: absorbing incoming damage into health

HediffDef.label: Accelerate Fate
HediffDef.description: the fate of this pawn has been Accelerated.

HediffDef.label: Ebisu's Favor(Farming)
HediffDef.description: a blessing of fortune in harvest, from one of the seven lucky gods. grant it bearer with a blessing of abundance harvest and food.

HediffDef.label: Daikokuten's Favor(Trading)
HediffDef.description: a blessing of fortune in wealth, from one of the seven lucky gods. grant it bearer with a blessing of commerce and wealth. trader deal will always in favor of this person more.

HediffDef.label: Bishamonten's Favor(War)
HediffDef.description: A blessing of fortune in war, from one of the seven lucky gods. As long as divine will permits it, its bearer shall never miss their strike, and never be marked by injury.

HediffDef.label: Benzaiten's Favor(Social)
HediffDef.description: a blessing of fortune in beauty and talent, from one of the seven lucky gods. grant it bearer with a blessing of beauty and talent. it bearer will find negotiation going in their favor. and animal will be more docile to them.

HediffDef.label: Jurōjin's Favor(health)
HediffDef.description: a blessing of fortune in longevity and good health, from one of the seven lucky gods. grant it bearer with a blessing of commerce and wealth. trader deal will always in favor of this person more.

HediffDef.label: Hotei's Favor(happiness)
HediffDef.description: a blessing of fortune in happiness contentment and charity, from one of the seven lucky gods. lift the bearer mood, make them see the world in a different way.

HediffDef.label: Fukurokuju's Favor(wisdom)
HediffDef.description: a blessing of fortune in wisdom, from one of the seven lucky gods. grant it bearer a wisdon of god. they will find inventing and tinkering much easier.

HediffDef.label: Fate's Favor
HediffDef.description: the string of fate for this pawn has been altered, many event and fortune will go in their favor. in addition, pawn can exchange 1 or more favor for several powerful buff. the more favor traded, the more powerful the buff is.

HediffDef.label: Fated Revenge
HediffDef.description: covered by the blessing of fate, the next incoming attack will reflect back several time the damage.

HediffDef.label: Fated Barrier
HediffDef.description: life-force of many pawn condensed into this pawn. should they ever take harmful damage beyond a certain threshold. one charge will be consumed to heal all the damage. in addition, they will never take more damage per hit than the giving threshold.

HediffDef.label: Missing Soul
HediffDef.description: Soul has been removed render this pawn in permanent state of coma.

HediffDef.label: Lich Soul
HediffDef.description: Soul has been sealed in a container. render it owner unkillable until the soul has been restored to their body.

HediffDef.label: Decaying
HediffDef.description: hit by a death bolt and slowly decaying

HediffDef.label: Rot
HediffDef.description: slowly decaying

HediffDef.label: True Dead
HediffDef.description: the curse of death coming closer.

HediffDef.label: Death Curse
HediffDef.description: dead come for all in the end. there no going back.

HediffDef.label: Soul Collection
HediffDef.description: souls has been gathered by the Collect Soul psycast, grant pawn a boost in power. tho be warn, when the user die, all the souls inside the container will burst out violently

li.restoreFocusDesc: consume 1 soul to restore all psyfocus. only work if pawn has 1 or more soul in collection

HediffDef.label: Deathward
HediffDef.description: Unworldly energy prevent certain hediff from taking place, or remove it if there already one

HediffDef.label: Helheim Strength
HediffDef.description: Unworldly energy boosting pawn combat capability. and nullify a set amount of attack.

HediffDef.label: Life Link
HediffDef.description: linked together with a thread of soul

HediffDef.label: Adaptive Armor
HediffDef.description: Adaptive armor that change based on incoming damage.

HediffDef.label: Adapt - Flame Resistance
HediffDef.description: Adaptive module to resist Flame damage

HediffDef.label: Adapt - Blunt Resistance
HediffDef.description: Adaptive module to resist Blunt damage.

HediffDef.label: Adapt - Sharp Resistance
HediffDef.description: Adaptive module to resist Sharp damage.

HediffDef.label: Distorted Blessing
HediffDef.description: distorted hediff that periodically give random buff

HediffDef.label: Distorted Manipulation
HediffDef.description: pawn work ability is boosted

HediffDef.label: Distorted Planting
HediffDef.description: plant work is boosted

HediffDef.label: Distorted Power
HediffDef.description: combat ability is boosted. Moving/Consciousness/Manipulation can't be lower than 100%.

HediffDef.label: distorted bullet
HediffDef.description: a blessing from Distorted Reality psycast, any projectile that this pawn shoot will have a 50% chance to bounce from target to target. using the same psycast on this pawn that already have this hediff will increase the amount of bounce left.

HediffDef.label: distorted shield
HediffDef.description: covered by multiple layer of distorted fabric, sending all incoming projectile into the void.

HediffDef.label: Failed roll count
HediffDef.description: failure count, the more stack to this hediff. the more likely for pawn to roll a great success in Ultimate Distortion

HediffDef.label: Locked Chain
HediffDef.description: movement locked by the chain of heaven.

HediffDef.label: Sky Blessing
HediffDef.description: mysterious force pulling this pawn projectile upward before split them into multiple piece raining down on target foe.

HediffDef.label: O'Flame, Set Ablaze
HediffDef.description: burning trail follow wherever this pawn go

HediffDef.label: O'Flame, Burn Bright
HediffDef.description: frenzied flame burning bright, boosting combat capability with each level.

HediffDef.label: Flame Frenzy
HediffDef.description: attacking the same target continuously making this pawn attack faster.

HediffDef.label: Marked
HediffDef.description: Marked by frenzied flame

HediffDef.label: Will of The Fallen
HediffDef.description: will of the fallen granting this pawn incredible strength, whenever they kill another pawn(humanlike/animal/mech) they gain a stack. and they deal a bonus damage equal to 10% of the stack

HediffDef.label: Path of Naraka
HediffDef.description: the path to enlightenment

HediffDef.label: Enlightment
HediffDef.description: found the truth of the world, consume 10% of Path of Naraka stack to snap out of mental break

HediffDef.label: Blackthread
HediffDef.description: the path to enlightenment

HediffDef.label: Headache
HediffDef.description: encountered a bad form of mentoring

HediffDef.label: Shivering Wind
HediffDef.description: cold of punishment

HediffDef.label: binded by karma
HediffDef.description: bind of karma, slow down pawn movement as long as they touched by the black thread

HediffDef.label: blessing of mother earth
HediffDef.description: fortified existence

HediffDef.label: calm mind
HediffDef.description: fortified mentality

HediffDef.label: guidance fire
HediffDef.description: guidance buff

HediffDef.Name: InspiringBuffBase
HediffDef.label: passion fire
HediffDef.description: passion buff

HediffDef.label: passion shootinig
HediffDef.description: passion shootinig

HediffDef.label: passion melee
HediffDef.description: passion melee

HediffDef.label: passion construction
HediffDef.description: passion construction

HediffDef.label: passion mining
HediffDef.description: passion mining

HediffDef.label: passion cooking
HediffDef.description: passion cooking

HediffDef.label: passion plants
HediffDef.description: passion plants

HediffDef.label: passion animals
HediffDef.description: passion animals

HediffDef.label: passion crafting
HediffDef.description: passion crafting

HediffDef.label: passion artistic
HediffDef.description: passion artistic

HediffDef.label: passion medical
HediffDef.description: passion medical

HediffDef.label: passion social
HediffDef.description: passion social

HediffDef.label: passion intellectual
HediffDef.description: passion intellectual

HediffDef.label: light punishment
HediffDef.description: impending doom countdown

HediffDef.label: kindling flame
HediffDef.description: flame of passion gathering

HediffDef.label: kindred spark
HediffDef.description: motivated and will work faster for the duration

HediffDef.label: passion crucible
HediffDef.description: every 1 hour this hediff will check if pawn gain a passion in any skill. if they do, the stack count will increase by equal to different between passion count before and after the check

HediffDef.label: artificial sun
HediffDef.description: holy light will blessing all ally in range

HediffDef.label: kindred motivation
HediffDef.description: motivated and will work faster for the duration

HediffDef.label: Akasha Record
HediffDef.description: shielded by blessing of Akasha
